parameters.subject: You're on the Waitlist! üéâ
Waitlist Alert
parameters.htmlMessage:
= {{ (() => { // Helper Functions const getProductName = (interest) => { switch(interest) { case 'business-in-a-box': return 'Business-in-a-Box Products'; case 'automation-packs': return 'Productized Automation Packs'; case 'both': return 'Both Products'; default: return 'Unknown Product'; } }; const getProductEmoji = (interest) => { switch(interest) { case 'business-in-a-box': return 'üì¶'; case 'automation-packs': return '‚ö°'; case 'both': return 'üì¶‚ö°'; default: return '‚ùì'; } }; const getProductColor = (interest) => { switch(interest) { case 'business-in-a-box': return '#3b82f6'; // Blue case 'automation-packs': return '#f59e0b'; // Orange case 'both': return '#8b5cf6'; // Purple default: return '#6b7280'; // Gray } }; const interest = $('Google Sheets - Add to Waitlist').item.json.interest const email = $('Google Sheets - Add to Waitlist').item.json.email const productName = getProductName(interest); const productEmoji = getProductEmoji(interest); const productColor = getProductColor(interest); const timestamp = new Date().toLocaleString('en-US', { timeZone: 'America/Chicago', dateStyle: 'full', timeStyle: 'short' }); return `
${productEmoji}

New Waitlist Signup!

Someone just joined the waitlist

üìã Signup Details

Email: ${email}
Interested In: ${productEmoji} ${productName}
Signed Up: ${timestamp}

What They're Interested In:

${interest === 'business-in-a-box' ? `

Business-in-a-Box Products - Looking for industry-specific automation templates (real estate, accounting, salons, home services)

` : ''} ${interest === 'automation-packs' ? `

Productized Automation Packs - Interested in quick-start automations (lead capture, invoicing, customer onboarding)

` : ''} ${interest === 'both' ? `

Both Products - High intent! Interested in both Business-in-a-Box AND Productized Automation Packs

` : ''}

üí° Suggested Actions:

  • Add to your email marketing system (waitlist segment)
  • Consider reaching out personally if high-value lead
  • Track in CRM for launch notification
    • ${interest === 'both' ? '
  • High Priority: This person wants both products - potential early adopter!
    • ' : ''}

This notification was sent automatically by your waitlist workflow.

`; })() }}
